mcq.statement: Identify the correct sequence of classifying an organism?

options.a: Species → Genus → Kingdom → Phylum → Class → Order → Family
options.b: Kingdom → Phylum → Class → Order → Family → Genus → Species
options.c: Kingdom → Phylum → Class → Family → Order →   Genus → Species
options.d: Species → Genus → Class → Phylum → Order → Kingdom → Family
